trans_title: 乐坛毒舌嗡嗡鸡 第十七季
introduction: A comedy trivia quiz based around pop music, originally hosted by Mark Lamarr up to October 2006, currently hosted by Simon Amstell. Te am  captains Phil Jupitus and Bill Bailey (who replaced Sean Hughes in May 2002) are joined each week by different music stars. Popular rounds include one where team members have to identify song intros hummed to them and another where a bygone music star has to be picked out of a line-up of lookalikes.• Season 17Episode # Air Date# Guests17-01               31/Oct/05   Katie Melua, Darren Hayes, Dave Fulton, Holly Willoughby17-02               07/Nov/05   Blak Twang, Jo Caulfield, Tony Livesey, Rowetta17-03               14/Nov/05   Chas Hodges, Yvette Fielding, Daniel Powter, Lucy Porter17-04               21/Nov/05   Dave Berry, Rich Hall, Brinsley Forde, Myleene Klass17-05               28/Nov/05   Rich Archer, Richard Park, Claudia Winkleman, Katrina Leskanich17-06               05/Dec/05   Tony Blackburn, Kathryn Williams, Nihal Arthanyake, Adam Hills17-07               12/Dec/05   Nate James, Lionel Blair, Steve Mason, Liz Bonnin17-08               20/Dec/05   Christmas Show17-09               30/Dec/05   Toyah Willcox, Alun Cochrane, Annie Mac, Ben Adams
chinese_title: 乐坛毒舌嗡嗡鸡 第十七季
